vulnerability.name: USN-4593-2
vulnerability.description: USN-4593-1 fixed a vulnerability in FreeType. This update provides the corresponding update for Ubuntu 14.04 ESM.  Original advisory details:   Sergei Glazunov discovered that FreeType did not correctly handle certain  malformed font files. If a user were tricked into using a specially crafted  font file, a remote attacker could cause FreeType to crash or possibly  execute arbitrary code with user privileges.

statements.status_notes: FreeType could be made to crash or run programs as your login if it opened a specially crafted file. Available with Ubuntu Pro.
